# PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.parametricStep(_:)

**Case**

A stride based on a parametric step value you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
case parametricStep(CGFloat)
```

## Stride types

- **PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.distance(_:)**: A stride based on a distance between elements you provide.
- **PKStrokePath.InterpolatedSlice.Stride.time(_:)**: A stride based on a time interval in seconds you provide.
